name: Vocapia Research
overview:
Vocapia Research is an R&D company and a software publisher developing and providing speech technologies and solutions for many languages, including most major European languages as well as Arabic, Mandarin, and Russian.

The Vocapia Research VoxSigma® software suite uses advanced language technologies such as language identification, speech recognition, and speaker identification to transform raw audio and audiovisual data into structured and searchable XML documents.

The VoxSigma sofware suite is also offered as a Web service via a REST API over HTTPS, allowing customers to quickly reap the benefits of regular improvements to the technology and take advantage of additional features offered by the online environment. The services are available 24/7/365 with failover servers and geographic redundancy.

Vocapia Research is located in the scientific pole of the Saclay Plateau, France.
